thread.title: Robert Hathaway
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Robert Hathaway

author: Robert Hathaway
title: Robert Hathaway
text: I was shopping for a new mattress. Gary A. was very knowledgeable, shared all the information about all products, gave me the time to make the best choice and purchase. I have worked with Gary A. 2 other times and he is the nicest guy to work with.
